parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Broken Commands

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Unlocks the given achievement. The achievements are listed in CfgAchievements, however none of the currently listed achievements is used in Arma 3, hence the command always returns [[false]].<br></br>

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command is obsolete and was used in the experimental (unreleased) <template><title>arma2</title></template> Xbox 360 version as stated
[https://forums.bohemia.net/forums/topic/187873-unlockachievment-command/?tab<template><title>=</title></template>comments#comment-2978436 here]. </value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> To unlock a [[Arma 3 Stat Names|Steam Achievement]] for <template><title>arma3</title></template>, see [[setStatValue]].</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[unlockAchievement]] name

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> name: [[String]] - achievement name

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if achievement was unlocked

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_isUnlocked = [[unlockAchievement]] "Hunter";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setStatValue]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
